findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The functions add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Owner privileges can mint
findings.description: Token owner has excessive privileges to mint tokens.

findings.title: Owner privileges can exclude from anti whale
findings.description: Token Operator has the privilege to exclude from anti-whale mechanism.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change maxTransferAmountRate
findings.description: Token Operator has the privilege to change maxTransferAmountRate.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change buyback and marketing fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change buyback and marketing fees, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change yuklaPerBlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change yuklaPerBlock, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change yuklaReferral
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to modify yuklaReferral, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change referralCommissionRate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the referral commission rate.

findings.title: Owner privileges can change startBlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the start block, which could lead to potential security risks.
